entry.title: RT dLux: Zero days to expiry options (0DTE) are options that expire in the same day that they’re traded. While scalps are great for <1 hour trading, ...
entry.summary: RT dLux Zero days to expiry options (0DTE) are options that expire in the same day that they’re traded. While scalps are great for <1 hour trading, 0DTE is the choice for a slightly longer time horizon. Soon enough, you’ll be able to trade these on Dopex. https://t.co/pL1myguzry

entry.title: 根据 The Standard 独家审查的监控录像和记录，周二凌晨 Cash APP 创始人 Bob Lee 走在旧金山一条空荡荡的街道上，一只手握住身体一侧，另一只手握着手机，身后...
entry.summary:
根据 The Standard 独家审查的监控录像和记录，周二凌晨 Cash APP 创始人 Bob Lee 走在旧金山一条空荡荡的街道上，一只手握住身体一侧，另一只手握着手机，身后留下一道血迹。“Help!” 他对着手机尖叫。“有人捅我。” Lee 凌晨 2 点 34 分拨打了 911 并反复尖叫求救，说他需要去医院。
吴说区块链: 吴说获悉，据 Protos，Bob Lee 职务包括加密货币 MobileCoin 和支付服务 Cash App 的创始人以及 Square 的前首席技术官；Lee 最近搬到了迈阿密，并在旧金山出差；警方在该市 Rincon Hill 街区附近发现 Lee 身上有多处刀伤；医务人员试图治疗 43 岁的 Lee… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1643574258243899396

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
